examples: Drill instructor: Get your armpit up there.

examples: The two friends were joined at the hip during their college years.

Jeff is a straight talker who always shoots from the hip.

examples: The exceptional taste of Temple oranges makes them a prized ingredient in gourmet recipes.
As midnight approaches, Buddhist temples around the country begin ringing out the old year.
He applied a few drops of spikenard oil to his temples, finding relief from his headache.

In the holy city of Varanasi, temples draw throngs of believers, who float oil lamps and marigolds.
words.defineEn: one of the two flat areas between the eyes and the ears

examples: So it's the thumbs up for Brighton's latest nightclub.

I'm all thumbs when it comes to making bows.

words.defineEn: the thick finger that has a different position than the other four
words.defineVi: ngón dày có vị trí khác với bốn ngón còn lại

examples: She painted her toenails a vibrant shade of red for the beach vacation.

I smoked a joint an hour ago, and I'm still waiting to come up.

examples: He is a self-interested liar, whose sole motive throughout his life has been looking after number one.

words.defineEn: the bottom area of someone's foot

examples: The library quickly withdrew the controversial novel from circulation after parents complained that there is no thief like a bad book, capable of corrupting even the most innocent of minds.

examples: My wife talked sense into me.

examples: Everybody hates the sight of you.

well, I took a beating in prison and I kind of lost my hearing, you know.

examples: stroke a nerve didn't I?
